title.narrative: DPSP I: Geothermal Development Lending Facility (GeoDELF)

description.narrative: Support sub-project sponsors during the early stage of the Geothermal Power Plants (GPPs) development through a risk mitigation financial instrument; also provide technical assistance to promote best practices in the development of geothermal resources for power and heat generation, particularly at early stage.

participating-org.narrative: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
